alt: Screenshot of multiple posts and comments on a website.
tools: HandleBars, JavaScript, CSS, JEST, Node, Sequelize, Authentication, Cookies, SQL, RESTful APIS and Crud.
description: This application allows users to create a profile and then engage in conversation regarding programming news from around the world.

alt: Screenshot showing a deep thought about the sky.
tools: React, JavaScript, CSS, Apollo Client, Heroku, GraphQL, MongoDB, Mutations, and JSON Web Tokens.
description: This is a website I develop while learning react, where users can add their thoughts, make friends, and react to each others posts.

alt: Photo of a budget being tracked over time.
tools: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, IndexedDB, Progressive Web Applications, MongoDB, Mongoose, and Express.
description: This is a budget app that a traveler could use to keep track of their budget. It will allow for the traveler to add transactions to their budget even when they do not have data/internet.

alt: Screenshot of a website for pizzas.
tools: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, IndexedDB, MongoDB, Mongoose, Validation, MongoDB Atlas, and EXpress.
description: This app was developed for users to post about their favorite pizza and discuss it online.

alt: Screenshot showing a website for food lovers to join events.
tools: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Webpack, Service Workers, PWA, and Lighthouse.
description: Created this PWA app during a lesson to create the ability for foodies to gather for events and purchase tickets for the event.

alt: Screenshot of a board game selector.
tools: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Web APIS, and Local Storage.
description: Created this website to allow users to search for and find a new favorite board game from a list of drop down options.
